Yvette Adounvo Atekpe bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego Ghana nke bụ onye isi njikwa mpaghara nke ụlọ ọrụ Internet Solutions ugbu a
Dịka onye bụbu onye so na kọmitii atụmatụ nzikọrịta ozi nke mba, o nyere aka depụta amụma nzikọrịta ozi nke Ghana nke 1999
Ọ na-esonye n'ọtụtụ bọọdụ nke gụnyere Ghana Internet Service Providers Association (GISPA), Internet Solutions Ghana, Dimension Data West Africa na Internet Solutions Mozambique
Atekpe gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Holy Child School
Ọ gara n'ihu na mahadum Ghana ebe ọ gụchara ma nweta nzere bachelọ na sociology
O nwere MBA na ire ahịa, nakwa CBA sitere na Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration na PGD na Marketing of Services site na Maastricht School of Management na Netherlands
Atekpe ugbu a bụ Regional Managing Director nke Internet Solutions, ọnọdụ ọ nọrọla kemgbe 2008
Ọ natala ọtụtụ ihe nrite, nke gụnyere:
